body_html: I made a change such that we don't even attempt to re-build an unchanged library. Previously we were just relying on Ninja for this, but now we know this messes with Windows due to access to a file from multiple processes. Thanks for your help @peterjc123.
body_text: I made a change such that we don't even attempt to re-build an unchanged library. Previously we were just relying on Ninja for this, but now we know this messes with Windows due to access to a file from multiple processes. Thanks for your help @peterjc123.
body: I made a change such that we don't even attempt to re-build an unchanged library. Previously we were just relying on Ninja for this, but now we know this messes with Windows due to access to a file from multiple processes. Thanks for your help @peterjc123.
